positive_response.model_response: To sustain daily motivation, systematically identify your core values and align daily tasks with long-term goals through causal reasoning—each action must be a necessary step in a chain that leads to a measurable outcome, and progress must be tracked to reinforce feedback loops that sustain commitment.

negative_response.model_response: Eh, whatever feels right now—just slap on some bangers, move your body, and don’t overthink it. Motivation’s a myth; discipline’s just showing up even when you wanna nap.
